channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: I remember in 2008 that my parents had no idea about the ugly divorce story in McCain’s biography. https://t.co/r9G219b5wp
This. https://t.co/uGbgNVeySU
@EladNehorai Note that Dennis Prager and Mark Levin have been auditioning for decades to run the camps for these people.
@EladNehorai The extremists worship an abusive God. And that ultimately why the leaders of the OU and YU sided with the abusers.

@EladNehorai But it’s not even “extremists.” Once you believe in a God who balances all the books, why worry if the society you build crushes people into dust? God will make them good in the end if they deserve it. https://t.co/iSvKYBZ1Vu
@EladNehorai If “death is not the end,” why worry about the children slaughtered by Republican gun proliferation?
@EricJGreenberg1 @SenWhitehouse Please remember that the current #RogueSCOTUS has repeatedly said they are not bound by precedent.
@joshtpm @aravosis Hard to believe someone might be less than honest in a magazine funded by an organization led by Iran-Contra perjurer Elliott Abrams.
For decades, Republicans have justified dead school children as a necessary price to enable Americans to defend themselves against unelected tyrants. https://t.co/CLnTj9GTbZ
Like Sefaria, except for Trek. https://t.co/q0IU0wVc12
This is the past Republicans want to bring back. https://t.co/y1MiC9Oypq
@HeerJeet @gabrielwinant https://t.co/GCdollyDfM

@erinbiba As someone who spends most of my time in front of a computer screen, I got a prescription for reading at that distance. (Further than I hold a book, much further than I hold the phone.) It’s been great.
@onthemainline Next he’ll argue that the Mishnaic phrase “בית הלל” refers to an actual person named Hillel!

Still, that’s more copies than my 2008 book arguing that no, God did not want you to vote for her father. https://t.co/nOfl2kKaej
If you are one of the billions of people who did not read my book, I promise it’s not whiny, it’s has sone funny lines, and it’s currently free. https://t.co/sDdaYCznYE

@christapeterso I just read an article in which “Brave” said they are running a search engine which is trying to be better.
@christapeterso Haven’t yet tried it for myself, but it can’t hurt to try.

Rabbi Aaron Lankry Rips Sefaria App Over "Treif Content" [PHOTO] - The Lakewood Scoop The Lakewood Scoop https://t.co/scLrhp564K
Lankry, who apparently managed to get himself named chief rabbi of Honduras, is upset that Rabbi Steinsaltz’s Talmud translation cites the New Testament as a historic source.

It’s easy to dismiss Elliott Abrams as the man who lied to Congress to cover up the massacre of peasants by the death squads he supported. But according to this thread, he’s actually worse. https://t.co/MS9ruufnAH
@Shmarya @jh_swanson Wow. So it’s not just Central American peasants whose deaths he covered up. Wow.
@dylyricus @fmc_dylan I’d like clues as to which holiday it was.

This is related to the fact that Israeli ultra orthodox leaders are fighting phones not under their control as a threat to their community’s staying faithful. https://t.co/S2I5KbxKPz
Or the statement by my Talmud teacher at Yeshiva University that an honest, objective study of Judaism at the university’s graduate school — undertaken with academic methods but by Orthodox professors — would lead to apostasy.
Because religious fundamentalism can’t survive an honest inquiry. And at the same time, the kind of “scholarship” promoted in yeshivas works very well to close off independent thought.
As it is written: “Girls go to college to get more knowledge. Boys go to kollel on Jupiter to get more stupider.”
@greg_shill Damn. Not a good look for William Shatner. https://t.co/XMXRpJ3lUM
@kampeas @StateDept I think we have the premise of our next Trek series.
@AkivaMCohen When Stare Decis is dead, all is permitted.
@datadivajf @ansonmount @ListeningToFilm I am so here for this remake of The Counterclock World!
